title: Etui Knife, ca. 1790
markings: On blade: BILBOA: = John Wilson, Brinsworth's Orchard, Sheffield, 1797 A DIRECTORY OF SHEFFIELD (...) (Sheffield, 1797) p.37
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped knife with straight sides. Flat rectangular handle with pewter sides. Front and back green painted ivory, inlaid with diamond-shaped mother-of-pearl and pewter on the centre of the handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Etui Knife, ca. 1790.
ca. 1790. Ivory, mother-of-pearl, pewter, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-133-a.
